haxe.reactive.StreamBool

type
class

Static Methods

and(streams : Iterable<Stream<Bool>>) : Stream<Bool>

parameters
streams An Iterable of the Streams to be evaluated
returns
An Stream of Bools, where each Bool event represents whether or not all events in the supplied Iterable> are true on a given time step.
Returns an Stream, the events of which are either true or false, depending on whether or not the supplied Iterable>'s values are all true for a given time step.

ifTrue<T>(stream : Stream<Bool>, thenE : Stream<T>, elseE : Stream<T>) : Stream<T>

parameters
stream An Stream of Bools that will be used to determine which Stream to return.
thenE The Stream that will be returned if stream == true;
elseE The Stream that will be returned if stream == false;
returns
If an event from stream == true stream thenE, else stream elseE
Switches off of an Stream of Bools, returning either a thenE Stream when true or an elseE when falseStream.

not(stream : Stream<Bool>) : Stream<Bool>

Returns a stream with the Bool of each value mapped to the opposite of the original stream.

or(streams : Iterable<Stream<Bool>>) : Stream<Bool>

parameters
streams An Iterable of the Streams to be evaluated
returns
An Stream of Bools, where each Bool event represents whether or not any events in the supplied Iterable> are true on a given time step.
Returns an Stream, the events of which are either true or false, depending on whether or not any of the values in the supplied Iterable> are all true for a given time step.
